suggest.meta_keywords: Edge Application, cache settings, TTL, bypass cache, forward cookies, Azion Console, Rules Engine, cache policy customization, Real-Time Manager, Application Accelerator
suggest.meta_description: Explore how to customize cache policies with Azion Edge Application using the Rules Engine for enhanced performance and flexibility in settings like TTL, bypass cache, and cookie forwarding.

current.meta_description: Learn how you can optimize processing times by defining the time-to-live (TTL) for cached content at the origin and at the browser, bypass origin cache settings, and forward cookies using Application Accelerator for Edge Application.
current.meta_keywords: edge cache, edge computing, ttl, bypass cache, forward cookies
